entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
